item.description:
One of my interests has always been white water rafting.  I am a frequent flier with Crab Apple White Water in Charlemont MA.  They are the best and super safe.

I have booked a trip on the Monroe Bridge section for the dam release Sunday, June 12, 2011.

Al-r has also posted this for his group.  If you are booked with him then you are all set.  Understand though that this trip will sell out so you need to book soon to get a spot.

The price for this trip is $95.  This includes the trip and BBQ lunch after the trip.  Monroe Bridge is a super fun section.  The meeting time at Crab Apple is 9:30 a.m. but I always get there a bit earlier.

http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/massachusetts/deerfield-monroe_bridge.shtml

This is the link to the information for this trip specifically.

If you are going to attend here are the steps:

1. Call Crab Apple 1-800-553-7238.

2. Tell them you want the Monroe trip June 12 and you are in Janice May's group.

3. Pay the nice folks and then respond to this site and tell me you are going.

There is nothing to be scared of with this activity.  If it has ever crossed your mind to try this activity, go for it.  I will post another trip in September but go for this.

You need to bring a change of clothes because you will get totally wet.  You will be paddling most of the trip. The link will tell you the age range for those who can participate in you are considering children.  My preference is that you book seperately if you want your kids there. This has some strenuous aspects to it.
